text: Yvan Darsigny is a retired weightlifter from Canada. Yvan competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. He was born on 2 March 1966.Yvan Darsigny == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Quebec
title: Yvan Darsigny
